trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised when the template mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för en <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> händelse som aktiveras när mallen läge ändras för en kontroll i designvyn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by a designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>händelse som utlöses av en designer värd [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], för vissa åtgärder på en kontroll i designvyn.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised when you enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: En händelse inträffar exempelvis när du anger eller avsluta mallredigeringsläge för en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klassen tillhandahåller en standard-delegat att hantera den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>händelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you exit or enter template editing mode, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a TemplateModeChangedEventArgs object.
trans-unit.target: När du avslutar eller ange mallredigeringsläge designer värden initierar en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objekt för en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>händelsetyp och anger den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>egenskap med ett TemplateModeChangedEventArgs-objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates that the template mode has changed, the default delegate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class updates the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objekt anger att mallen har ändrats, standard delegaten i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klassen uppdaterar värdet för den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Anpassade designers som är härledda från den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>klassen kan åsidosätta den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>metod för att utföra ytterligare bearbetning när mallredigeringsläge läge ändras för en kontroll i designvyn.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelser och delegater finns [NIB: händelser och delegater](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified template group.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs"> </xref> klass med den angivna mall-gruppen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate method uses the TemplateModeChangedEventArgs constructor to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for use with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>delegatmetod använder TemplateModeChangedEventArgs konstruktorn för att initiera en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>objekt för användning med en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: When you exit or enter template editing mode, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: När du avslutar eller ange mallredigeringsläge designer värden initierar en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objekt för en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>händelsetyp och anger den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>egenskap med ett <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The `newTemplateGroup` parameter specifies a new template group when you enter template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: Den `newTemplateGroup` parametern anger en ny mallgrupp när du anger mallredigeringsläge.

trans-unit.source: The `newTemplateGroup` parameter is typically `null` for exiting template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: Den `newTemplateGroup` parameter är vanligtvis `null` avslutar mallredigeringsläge.

trans-unit.source: A new template group that is used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs.NewTemplateGroup*>.
trans-unit.target: En ny mallgrupp som används för att initiera <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs.NewTemplateGroup*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs.NewTemplateGroup*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the template group that was created when you entered template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar mallgruppen som skapades när du har angett mallredigeringsläge.

trans-unit.source: The NewTemplateGroup property specifies a new template group when you enter template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen NewTemplateGroup anger en ny mallgrupp när du anger mallen redigeringsläget.

trans-unit.source: NewTemplateGroup is `null`for events that are raised when you exit template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: NewTemplateGroup är `null`för händelser som aktiveras när du avslutar mallredigeringsläge.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup"></xref> if you entered template editing mode with a new template; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup"> </xref> om du har angett mallredigeringsläge med en ny mall; annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
